markdownRemark.html:
Big Data Modeling and Management Systems

Basics of Big Data

  • Three major sources:

    • Machines
    • People
    • Organization

  • Characteristics of Big Data

    • Volume — the scale of data
    • Velocity — streaming speed of data
    • Variety — different forms of data
    • Veracity — uncertainity of data
    • Valence — connectedness of data

Data Management

  • Data Ingestion: getting the data into the data system
  • Data Storage: capacity and scalability
  • Data Quality: error free and trusted sources
  • Data Operations: subarray, subset, merge, functions
  • Data Scalability and Security: scaling up vs scaling out

Course Completion Certificate: Big Data Modeling and Management Systems
